rows: Roll on the 25 GP {@book Art Objects|XDMG|6|25 GP Art Objects} table.
Roll on the 250 GP {@book Art Objects|XDMG|6|250 GP Art Objects} table.
Roll on the 750 GP {@book Art Objects|XDMG|6|750 GP Art Objects} table.
Roll on the 2,500 GP {@book Art Objects|XDMG|6|2,500 GP Art Objects} table.

Roll on a Common Magic Items table of your choice ({@book Arcana|XDMG|6|Arcana—Common}, {@book Armaments|XDMG|6|Armaments—Common}, {@book Implements|XDMG|6|Implements—Common}, or {@book Relics|XDMG|6|Relics—Common}).

Roll on an Uncommon Magic Items table of your choice ({@book Arcana|XDMG|6|Arcana—Uncommon}, {@book Armaments|XDMG|6|Armaments—Uncommon}, {@book Implements|XDMG|6|Implements—Uncommon}, or {@book Relics|XDMG|6|Relics—Uncommon}).

Roll on a Rare Magic Items table of your choice ({@book Arcana|XDMG|6|Arcana—Rare}, {@book Armaments|XDMG|6|Armaments—Rare}, {@book Implements|XDMG|6|Implements—Rare}, or {@book Relics|XDMG|6|Relics—Rare}).
table.name: Treasure
